org.hazelwire.main
Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
  org.hazelwire.main.Configuration

public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object

This class manages all the configuration, first a default configuration is loaded then the values are overwritten with user-set values if set. In order to ensure synchronisity of configuration-values among all classes it is implemented with the singleton pattern. It is synchronized to ensure it's also thread-safe

Author:
Tim Strijdhorst
